mapper.update: update `project` set project_code = #{search.projectCode}, project_name = #{search.projectName}, price = #{search.price}, amount = #{search.amount}, provider_id = #{search.providerId}, provider_code = #{search.providerCode}, provider_name = #{search.providerName}, creation_date = now(), by_date = #{search.byDate}, end_date = #{search.endDate}, staff_id = #{search.staffId}, staff_code = #{search.staffCode}, department_id = #{search.departmentId}, purchase_mode = #{search.purchaseMode}, payment_process = #{search.paymentProcess}, project_implement_process = #{search.projectImplementProcess} where id = #{search.id}
mapper.insert: insert into project (project_code, project_name, price, amount, provider_id, provider_code, provider_name, creation_date, by_date,staff_id, staff_code, department_id, purchase_mode, payment_process, project_implement_process) values (#{search.projectCode}, #{search.projectName}, #{search.price}, #{search.amount}, #{search.providerId}, #{search.providerCode}, #{search.providerName}, now() , #{search.byDate}, #{search.staffId}, #{search.staffCode}, #{search.purchaseMode}, #{search.paymentProcess}, #{search.projectImplementProcess} , #{search.departmentId})
mapper.select:
select pro.id, pro.project_code, pro.project_name, pro.price, pro.amount, pro.provider_id, pro.provider_code, pro.provider_name, pro.creation_date, pro.by_date, pro.end_date, pro.staff_id, pro.staff_code, pro.department_id, dep.department_name, pro.payment_process, pro.project_implement_process, pro.purchase_mode from project pro left join staff stf on pro.staff_id = stf.id left join department dep on pro.department_id = dep.id left join provider pvd on pro.provider_id = pvd.id where 1=1
AND pro.project_name like concat('%', #{search.projectName}, '%')
AND pro.project_implement_process like concat('%', #{search.projectImplementProcess}, '%')
AND pro.purchase_mode like concat('%', #{search.purchaseMode}, '%')
AND pro.payment_process like concat('%', #{search.paymentProcess}, '%')
AND pro.department_id = #{search.departmentId}
GROUP BY pro.id
